Colophon

  • Built with Eleventy.
  • Hosted on Github.
  • Tracking with Plausible.
  • Cardo by David J. Perry. It is an alternative version of the poplar font Bembo; it uses the same original typeface cut.
  • ET Book is also a Bembo-like font by Dmitry Krasny, Bonnie Scranton, and Edward Tufte. Digitised by Adam Schartz. Used for headlines.
  • Inter by Rasmus Andersson. Used for footntoes as well as blockquotes and tables.
